channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
okay.. i downloaded a source thats called exion... and i run the server and client when i log into the game i can play like 6-7 seconds then this hapenns and it closes [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/6sz9ty.png[/img]
Looks like none can fix this.. i searched all over google about this there are some people which they get this too.. but they dont get good fixing methods :\
